concept.title: Deduplicator
concept.shortdesc: The Deduplicator discards records from the pipeline that include duplicate data. The Deduplicator routes data to two streams, one for unique records and one for duplicate records. Use the Deduplicator to route or discard duplicate data.

conbody.p: The Deduplicator can compare entire records or a subset of fields. Use a subset of fields to focus the comparison of duplicate data on the fields of particular concern. For example, to discard duplicate purchase events, you might compare information about the purchaser, selected items, and shipping address, but ignore the timestamp of the event.example from Natty. murmurhash3 128?
To enhance pipeline performance, the Deduplicator hashes the comparison fields and uses the hashed values when evaluating for duplicates.
